Hidras:

H}Predacon's computer received a signal that a forengier Bot was around 
base's area.

WHo could be the bot who challenge with his or her precence at Predacons???


A feeling said him don't attack by now, not yet but...

"WEll stranger... "said Hidras by commlink"I know that you're here... OR 
you're a brave bot or a stupid one to come here... Tell me rightnow your 
intentions or" Hidras pressed a button and the auto-deffences started to 
appear the hidden cannons that covered the bas "face your doom.... ANSWER 
NOW!"








>From: "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@...>" <EmprzAnastazia@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Race against time: Stalking
>Date: Fri, 07 Feb 2003 02:10:29 -0000
>
>After a little time, she transformed into her animal mode, even
>though she didn't care for it much, it was a good disguise though.
>
>Resting, laying down in the stle & likeness of a normal feline,
>forelegs in front of her, hind legs off to the side & behind her. The
>soft breeze barely ruffled her fur.. or what you call fur.
>
>Her clear blue optics took in everything that she could see whilst
>observing the Predacon base.
>
>She found it ironic. The Predacons she knew... so long ago... Were
>wild, ruthless, savage... Razorclaw, Rampage, Divebomb, Headstrong,
>Tantrum. They had served well. Using the 'natural animal instinct' to
>assist in their fighting. Funny though.. they were 100% robot. They
>were fantastic warriors.
>
>But these.. these who were now called Predacons... she would see if
>they measured up to their predacessors.
>
>Her optics observed the base. Waiting.. watching for any sign of
>Hydras. She was curious about this supposed Leader. Or should she
>say... leaders. 'If he really was Megatron...' she pondered that
>thought for a moment.
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > Maxima soared through the air. It was natural, in a way, for her to
>be
> > flying. It was something she did for millions of years.
> >
> > As the ground sped past her below, her optics caught site of a
>craft as she
> > neared the Predacon base.
> >
> > Landing a few miles upon a ridge, she watched the craft, then her
>optics
> > turned back to the base to observe. A pity that she still didn't
>have her old
> > form. She would be able to scan all that was going on, & with her
>stealth
> > form, get closer.
> >
> > But for now... she was upon the ridge, observing. Waiting for
>her ...
> > victum.. prey... this.. Hydras.
>
